name: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
summary: In this game, you'll face increasingly relentless hordes of enemies and formidable bosses, all while discovering an array of valuable items and surprises along the way. Prepare for a casual yet intensely challenging gaming experience, with a wide range of battle combinations at your disposal.
